name: Key Value Table
description:
A basic table with two columns, key and value. Useful for brainstorming project ideas and object modeling.


Other table options dont consider the impact of losing your data. They have bad placed one click delete buttons and buggy interfaces that auto erase data. This was the inspiration for this widget.


Features

  • Value column wraps content automatically for easy use
  • Rearange row positioning
  • Add as many rows as you want
  • 8 table colors


We are willing to include other features and even create another widget with multiple table columns if the community requests it.
